name: Pin-Knight
description:
My entry for BoredPixelsJam 8 - a small pinball game where your not the hero...

Instructions are in-game, so load it up and have fun!

(Sorry that its a bit buggy and not that great - I wasted two days on failed ideas, then missed most of another two...)

I hope you enjoy ;p

EDIT: Forgot to add, if you hit the enemies body, it will die and give you points, but if you hit into it's blade it will take away one of your lives.

EDIT: *Slaps face* I'm SO sorry I forgot to add the heart explanations to the in-game instructions. Basically, they just restore your health when you touch them. Thats it. Thanks!
